title: FOIA - CPD - First Amendment Worksheets from Jan 1st, 2024 to Sep 20, 2024

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act., I hereby request the following records:

A copy of all First Amendment Worksheets (http://directives.chicagopolice.org/forms/CPD-11.440.pdf) created from January 1st, 2024 to September 20, 2024.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

J Ader

communications.subject: Arkansas Freedom of Information Act Request: Complaint Letters
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Arkansas Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

A copy of all "informal complaints" sent to the Arkansas Public Service Commission and all "informal investigation reports" issued by the Arkansas Public Service Commission in the year 2023 and 2024 through the date of this filing.

For context, the Arkansas Public Service Commission's General Service Rules (Rule 2.07) state: "The Commission shall investigate each informal complaint, issue an informal complaint investigation report to the complainant, and notify the utility of the results of the investigation". The General Service Rules can be found here: https://www.sos.arkansas.gov/uploads/rulesRegs/Arkansas%20Register/2002/jul_2002/126.03.02-004.pdf

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Sonny Albarado, a citizen of Arkansas, in coordination with Daniel Tait.
